about.title: Sewer management throughout the Netherlands.
about.intro1: Ontstoppingslijn is a nationwide network of experienced drain and sewer specialists. Not a large company with expensive offices, but professionals who take their work seriously.
about.intro2: Every situation is different. That's why we don't work with standard solutions, but assess each case individually. Honest advice, clear prices and work we stand behind.
about.intro3: From Amsterdam to Maastricht — we ensure there's always a technician available near you. Fast, reliable and available 24/7.

smell.title: Sewer smell indoors
smell.description: A foul smell from your drain, shower or toilet? This often indicates a blockage, dry water trap or damaged sewer.
smell.solution: We locate the cause and fix it right away →

flies.title: Drain flies
flies.description: Small flies around drains and toilets? Drain flies breed in buildup inside your pipes.

gurgling.title: Gurgling toilet or drain
gurgling.description: Gurgling sounds from your toilet or drain indicate air problems in the sewer, often caused by a blockage further down.

slow.title: Slow draining water
slow.description: Shower, sink or kitchen drain getting slower? A partial blockage only gets worse over time.
slow.solution: Prevent worse — get it fixed now →

overflow.title: Sewer odour nuisance
overflow.description: Odour nuisance in or around your property? This may indicate a broken or blocked sewer that needs immediate attention.

0.text: Drain blocked on Sunday evening, the technician was there within an hour. Quickly resolved and everything left neat. Top service!

1.text: Professional and friendly. Drain was completely blocked, but within half an hour everything was flowing again. Fair price too.

2.text: Had a camera inspection done due to recurring blockages. Root growth found and dealt with immediately. Very satisfied!

3.text: Toilet blocked and the technician was there within 2 hours. Worked neatly and hygienically. Price was exactly as agreed.

4.text: Sewer cleaning for our business premises. Professionally executed with high-pressure cleaning. Noticed the difference immediately. Recommended!

5.text: Kitchen drain was completely clogged with grease. Technician had it sorted in 20 minutes. Also gave good prevention tips.

6.text: Very professional and reliable. Sewer repair carried out without digging up the entire garden. Great work!

7.text: Water damage in the basement from a blocked rainwater drain. Quickly helped and the problem is permanently resolved.

8.text: Used Ontstoppingslijn twice now. Always on time, always honest and always good work. Regular customer!

9.text: Emergency on Saturday and still helped quickly. The technician was friendly and professional. Definitely recommended!

0.question: How quickly can you arrive for a blocked drain?
0.answer: For emergencies, we're often on-site within 1-2 hours. We're available 24/7, including weekends and holidays.

1.question: What does it cost to unblock a drain?
1.answer: A standard drain unblocking starts from €149. The exact cost depends on the severity and location of the blockage. Prices exclude VAT.

2.question: Are you active throughout the Netherlands?
2.answer: Yes, we work with a nationwide network of experienced technicians. From Groningen to Maastricht.

3.question: Do you also work for businesses and HOAs?
3.answer: Yes, we provide drain services for individuals, businesses, property managers, HOAs and government institutions.

4.question: Do I need to be home during the work?
4.answer: Yes, someone needs to be present to provide access. Most jobs take 30-60 minutes.
